meanings.definition: To act or speak on behalf of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: During the play, Sarah was representing the queen and delivering her message.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer was representing the defendant in court.
meanings.sent3: Tom, representing the cat, tried to meow during the school play.
meanings.sent4: The dove, representing peace, flew gracefully across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The superhero, representing justice, fought against evil forces.

meanings.definition: To symbolize or stand for something.
meanings.sent1: The white dove representing peace was released into the sky.
meanings.sent2: In many cultures, the color black can represent mourning.
meanings.sent3: The red rose, representing love, bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse, representing hope, guided ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: The olive branch, representing reconciliation, was offered as a gesture of peace.

meanings.definition: To depict or portray something in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The artist was representing the sunset with vibrant colors in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The documentary film accurately represented the life of the famous scientist.
meanings.sent3: The comedian, representing a clumsy waiter, spilled water on the guests for laughs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile, representing happiness, lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The statue, representing freedom, stood tall in the town square.
